constraints.asset_guideline: Use simple shapes or 1-color sprites you can draw yourself. Avoid heavy external asset packs.
constraints.scope_guideline: One core mechanic plus a small scoring or objective layer.

ideas.name: One-Button Hopper
ideas.short_description: A tiny platformer where you only control jump timing to hop across moving gaps.
ideas.core_mechanic: Single-button jump with variable height (tap vs hold).
ideas.gameplay_loop: Wait for the right moment, jump to the next platform, collect coins for score, repeat until you reach the exit.
ideas.win_conditions: Reach the exit flag with at least 1 life remaining.
ideas.lose_conditions: Fall off the screen or run out of lives.

prototypes.name: Jump Feel
prototypes.goal: Implement tap vs hold jump height and a simple ground check.

prototypes.name: Moving Platforms
prototypes.goal: Add one moving platform type and make landing stable.

prototypes.name: Checkpoint + Lives
prototypes.goal: Add respawn at checkpoint, lives counter, and restart on zero.

ideas.name: Color Swap Dodger
ideas.short_description: Dodge incoming shapes by switching your player color to match safe lanes.
ideas.core_mechanic: Toggle between two colors that determine what obstacles can hurt you.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Obstacles scroll in, you switch color and move left or right to survive, score increases over time.
ideas.win_conditions: Survive for 60 seconds (or reach a target score).
ideas.lose_conditions: Touch an obstacle that does not match your current color.

prototypes.name: Two-Color Player
prototypes.goal: Toggle color and update player visuals.

prototypes.name: Obstacle Stream
prototypes.goal: Spawn obstacles in lanes with speed that slowly increases.

prototypes.name: Hit Rules
prototypes.goal: Implement color-based collision and a clean game over screen.

ideas.name: Top-Down Package Runner
ideas.short_description: Pick up packages and deliver them to matching drop-off zones before time runs out.
ideas.core_mechanic: Pickup and drop items with simple interaction prompts.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Grab a package, navigate around walls, deliver to the correct zone, repeat for a score streak.
ideas.win_conditions: Deliver N packages before the timer ends.
ideas.lose_conditions: Timer reaches zero.

prototypes.name: Top-Down Movement
prototypes.goal: Implement 4-direction movement with collision against walls.

prototypes.name: Pickup System
prototypes.goal: Press a key near an item to pick it up and carry it.

prototypes.name: Deliver + Timer
prototypes.goal: Drop off to the right zone, increase score, and end on timeout.

ideas.name: Bubble Pop Aim Trainer
ideas.short_description: Pop bubbles that float up by clicking or tapping them before they escape.
ideas.core_mechanic: Pointer-based aim and click detection on moving targets.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Bubbles spawn, rise and drift, you pop them for points, misses reduce accuracy or lives.
ideas.win_conditions: Reach a target score within the time limit.
ideas.lose_conditions: Run out of lives due to misses or escaped bubbles.

prototypes.name: Clickable Targets
prototypes.goal: Spawn circles and detect clicks to destroy them.

prototypes.name: Motion Patterns
prototypes.goal: Add rising and slight horizontal drift with random speed.

prototypes.name: Scoring + Misses
prototypes.goal: Track hits, misses, and end the game cleanly.

ideas.name: Laser Mirror Puzzle
ideas.short_description: Rotate mirrors to guide a laser from a source to a target.
ideas.core_mechanic: Rotate mirror pieces to redirect a ray.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Place or rotate mirrors, test the laser path, adjust until the beam hits the goal.
ideas.win_conditions: Laser hits the target for 2 seconds.
ideas.lose_conditions: No lose state, but you can reset the level.

prototypes.name: Raycast Laser
prototypes.goal: Draw a laser line and stop it on walls.

prototypes.name: Mirror Reflection
prototypes.goal: Reflect the laser off mirror surfaces.

prototypes.name: Goal Detection
prototypes.goal: Detect when the beam hits the target and complete the level.

ideas.name: Conveyor Sorter
ideas.short_description: Sort falling shapes into the correct bins by flipping a gate.
ideas.core_mechanic: Toggle a gate that routes objects left or right.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Items come down a conveyor, you toggle the gate based on item type, keep streak for points.
ideas.win_conditions: Sort 30 items with at least 80% accuracy.
ideas.lose_conditions: Accuracy drops below 80% after 30 items, or too many wrong sorts in a row.

prototypes.name: Conveyor Spawn
prototypes.goal: Spawn shapes at intervals and move them along a path.

prototypes.name: Gate Toggle
prototypes.goal: Flip a gate to send items to left or right.

prototypes.name: Bins + Accuracy
prototypes.goal: Detect bin entry, score correct sorts, track accuracy.

ideas.name: Orbit Defender
ideas.short_description: Protect a planet by rotating a shield around it to block incoming meteors.
ideas.core_mechanic: Rotate a shield around a center point.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Meteors fly toward the planet, rotate shield to intercept, survive waves to build score.
ideas.lose_conditions: Planet takes 3 hits.

prototypes.name: Orbit Movement
prototypes.goal: Rotate a shield around a planet using left and right input.

prototypes.name: Meteor Spawner
prototypes.goal: Spawn meteors from random edges that move toward the center.

prototypes.name: Health System
prototypes.goal: Block reduces meteor, misses damage planet, show health UI.

ideas.name: Line Draw Bridge
ideas.short_description: Draw a single line to create a bridge so a ball can roll into the goal.
ideas.core_mechanic: Player-drawn physics line that becomes a platform.
ideas.gameplay_loop: See the ball and goal, draw a line, press play, the ball rolls, iterate until it lands in the goal.
ideas.lose_conditions: Ball falls off screen or stops moving for 5 seconds.

prototypes.name: Draw Line
prototypes.goal: Draw with mouse to create a line mesh or collider.

prototypes.name: Physics Ball
prototypes.goal: Spawn a ball and let gravity roll it on the drawn line.

prototypes.name: Goal Zone
prototypes.goal: Detect win and add reset button for retries.

ideas.name: Stealth Light Cones
ideas.short_description: Sneak from start to exit while avoiding moving guard light cones.
ideas.core_mechanic: Avoid detection zones that sweep back and forth.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move between cover spots, time your runs past light cones, reach the exit.
ideas.win_conditions: Reach the exit without being detected 3 times.
ideas.lose_conditions: Get detected 3 times.

prototypes.name: Detection Zones
prototypes.goal: Make cone-shaped trigger zones that detect the player.

prototypes.name: Sweeping Movement
prototypes.goal: Rotate cones back and forth with adjustable speed.

prototypes.name: Alert + Reset
prototypes.goal: On detection, play alert feedback and reset to last checkpoint.

ideas.name: Simple Farming Clicker
ideas.short_description: Plant, wait, harvest, and upgrade your tiny farm with simple timers.
ideas.core_mechanic: Click a plot to change its state: empty, planted, grown, harvested.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Plant seeds, wait a short time, harvest for coins, buy faster growth upgrades, repeat.
ideas.lose_conditions: No lose state, but you can reset progress.

prototypes.name: Plot States
prototypes.goal: Create a plot with 3 states and click to progress.

prototypes.name: Growth Timer
prototypes.goal: Add a timer that turns planted into grown.

prototypes.name: Coins + Upgrade
prototypes.goal: Add coins and one upgrade that reduces growth time.

ideas.name: Pinball Pocket
ideas.short_description: A tiny pinball table with two flippers and bumpers for points.
ideas.core_mechanic: Flippers apply impulse to a ball.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Launch the ball, use flippers to keep it alive, hit bumpers to score, avoid draining.
ideas.win_conditions: Reach a target score before losing all balls.
ideas.lose_conditions: All balls are drained.

prototypes.name: Ball Physics
prototypes.goal: Create a ball with bouncy collisions and gravity.

prototypes.name: Flipper Control
prototypes.goal: Implement two flippers that rotate and push the ball.

prototypes.name: Bumpers + Score
prototypes.goal: Add bumpers that add points and a drain detector.

ideas.name: Sokoban Mini
ideas.short_description: Push boxes onto target tiles in a small grid puzzle.
ideas.core_mechanic: Grid movement with box pushing rules.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move one tile at a time, push boxes, plan moves, finish when all targets are covered.
ideas.win_conditions: All boxes are on target tiles.
ideas.lose_conditions: No lose state, but you can reset and count moves.

prototypes.name: Grid Movement
prototypes.goal: Move the player on a grid with walls.

prototypes.name: Push Rules
prototypes.goal: Push a box if the next tile is empty.

prototypes.name: Win Check
prototypes.goal: Detect all targets filled and show completion UI.

ideas.name: Rhythm Tap Lanes
ideas.short_description: Tap the correct lane when a note reaches the hit line.
ideas.core_mechanic: Timing window for taps on lanes.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Notes scroll down, you tap lane keys on beat, accuracy builds score, misses reduce streak.
ideas.win_conditions: Finish the song with at least 70% accuracy.
ideas.lose_conditions: Accuracy drops below 50% at any point (optional).

prototypes.name: Scrolling Notes
prototypes.goal: Spawn notes that move toward a hit line.

prototypes.name: Hit Window
prototypes.goal: Check timing when player presses a lane key.

prototypes.name: Accuracy UI
prototypes.goal: Track hit, miss, streak, and show results screen.

ideas.name: Wind Glider
ideas.short_description: Glide through wind currents and avoid spikes to reach a goal.
ideas.core_mechanic: Hold to glide, release to drop, wind zones push you.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Launch, glide through wind zones, avoid hazards, land on safe platforms, reach the exit.
ideas.lose_conditions: Hit spikes or fall off screen.

prototypes.name: Glide Control
prototypes.goal: Implement slower fall when holding a button.

prototypes.name: Wind Zones
prototypes.goal: Create areas that add force in a direction.

prototypes.name: Hazards
prototypes.goal: Add spikes and a simple restart on collision.

ideas.name: Guard the Garden
ideas.short_description: Stop pests from reaching plants by placing one type of turret on a grid.
ideas.core_mechanic: Place a turret that shoots automatically at nearest enemy.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Enemies walk along a path, you place turrets, turrets shoot, you survive waves.
ideas.lose_conditions: 3 enemies reach the plants.

prototypes.name: Path Enemies
prototypes.goal: Move enemies along a simple path of waypoints.

prototypes.name: Turret Targeting
prototypes.goal: Turret finds nearest enemy and shoots a projectile.

prototypes.name: Wave System
prototypes.goal: Spawn waves and end level on survival or leaks.

ideas.name: Magnet Collector
ideas.short_description: Turn a magnet on and off to pull coins to you while avoiding pulling bombs.
ideas.core_mechanic: Toggle magnetic force that attracts specific objects.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move around, toggle magnet, collect coins, avoid bombs, reach a score goal.
ideas.lose_conditions: Collect a bomb or take 3 hits.

prototypes.name: Attraction Force
prototypes.goal: Apply force toward player when magnet is on.

prototypes.name: Object Types
prototypes.goal: Make coins attracted, bombs attracted, rocks not attracted.

prototypes.name: Risk Reward
prototypes.goal: Add a safe radius and a hit system for bombs.

ideas.name: Mini Brawler Knockback
ideas.short_description: A simple arena where you knock enemies out of the ring using directional attacks.
ideas.core_mechanic: Short-range attack that applies knockback.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move, attack, knock enemies away, avoid getting knocked out, clear the arena.
ideas.lose_conditions: Player falls out of the arena.

prototypes.name: Arena Movement
prototypes.goal: Implement top-down movement and arena bounds.

prototypes.name: Attack + Knockback
prototypes.goal: Attack in facing direction and push enemies back.

prototypes.name: Ring Out
prototypes.goal: Detect falling out and handle win and lose screens.

ideas.name: Memory Match Tiles
ideas.short_description: Flip tiles to find matching pairs with a limited number of turns.
ideas.core_mechanic: Reveal and match pairs.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Flip two tiles, if match keep revealed, if not hide again, clear all pairs before turns run out.
ideas.lose_conditions: Use all turns without matching all pairs.

prototypes.name: Tile Flip
prototypes.goal: Click a tile to reveal its symbol and lock while flipped.

prototypes.name: Match Logic
prototypes.goal: Compare two flipped tiles and decide match or hide.

prototypes.name: Turns Limit
prototypes.goal: Add a turns counter and end screens.

ideas.name: Mini Golf Flick
ideas.short_description: Flick the ball with drag strength to reach the hole in few shots.
ideas.core_mechanic: Drag to set shot direction and power.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Aim, shoot, ball rolls and bounces, count strokes, finish the hole.
ideas.win_conditions: Ball enters the hole within max strokes.
ideas.lose_conditions: Exceed max strokes.

prototypes.name: Drag Shot
prototypes.goal: Drag mouse to set direction and power, apply impulse.

prototypes.name: Hole Detection
prototypes.goal: Detect when ball reaches hole and stop movement.

prototypes.name: Stroke Limit
prototypes.goal: Track strokes and reset on too many.

ideas.name: Traffic Light Timing
ideas.short_description: Let cars pass by switching a traffic light, but avoid crashes and long waits.
ideas.core_mechanic: Switch between two directions with a timed light.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Cars approach from two roads, you switch light to let one side go, keep flow, score for safe passes.
ideas.lose_conditions: Cause 3 crashes or build a queue too long.

prototypes.name: Car Spawner
prototypes.goal: Spawn cars and move them along two lanes.

prototypes.name: Traffic Light
prototypes.goal: Stop or release cars based on light state.

prototypes.name: Crash Rules
prototypes.goal: Detect collisions in intersection and count crashes.

ideas.name: Maze Key Hunt
ideas.short_description: Find keys in a small maze and unlock the exit while avoiding a slow chaser.
ideas.core_mechanic: Collect keys and unlock doors.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Explore maze, grab key, open door, avoid chaser, reach exit.
ideas.lose_conditions: Get caught by the chaser.

prototypes.name: Maze Movement
prototypes.goal: Top-down movement with wall collisions.

prototypes.name: Key + Door
prototypes.goal: Pick up key and open a door that blocks the exit.

prototypes.name: Simple Chaser
prototypes.goal: Enemy follows player with basic seek movement.

ideas.name: Stack the Blocks
ideas.short_description: Drop blocks to stack as high as possible with simple left-right movement.
ideas.core_mechanic: Drop timing with alignment bonuses.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move block, drop it, trim overhang, stack higher, repeat until you miss too much.
ideas.lose_conditions: A block is too small to land or falls off the stack.

prototypes.name: Drop and Land
prototypes.goal: Move a block side to side and drop it with gravity.

prototypes.name: Trim Overhang
prototypes.goal: Cut off the overhanging part based on overlap.

prototypes.name: Score and Fail
prototypes.goal: Score for perfect drops and end game when overlap is zero.

ideas.name: Fishing Line Tug
ideas.short_description: A simple fishing mini game where you keep tension in the safe zone to catch fish.
ideas.core_mechanic: Hold and release to keep a slider in a target range.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Hook fish, manage tension meter, catch fish for points, repeat.
ideas.lose_conditions: Tension meter hits zero or max too many times (fish escapes).

prototypes.name: Tension Meter
prototypes.goal: Create a meter that rises when holding and falls when releasing.

prototypes.name: Safe Zone
prototypes.goal: Add a target zone and detect if meter stays inside.

prototypes.name: Catch Logic
prototypes.goal: Fill a progress bar while in zone, lose progress outside.

ideas.name: Enemy Wave Shooter
ideas.short_description: A top-down shooter with one weapon, simple enemies, and a clear survival goal.
ideas.core_mechanic: Move and shoot toward the cursor with a basic cooldown.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Enemies spawn, you shoot and dodge, collect small health pickups, survive waves.
ideas.lose_conditions: Health reaches zero.

prototypes.name: Move + Shoot
prototypes.goal: Implement movement and shooting with a cooldown.

prototypes.name: Basic Enemy
prototypes.goal: Spawn enemies that move toward player and deal damage on touch.

prototypes.name: Waves + Pickups
prototypes.goal: Add wave timer and occasional health pickups.

ideas.name: Platform Switch Puzzle
ideas.short_description: Toggle platforms on and off to create a path to the goal.
ideas.core_mechanic: Switch that changes which platforms are solid.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Jump and navigate, hit switches to toggle platforms, reach exit.
ideas.lose_conditions: Fall off screen or touch hazard spikes.

prototypes.name: Toggle Platforms
prototypes.goal: Enable and disable platform colliders with a switch.

prototypes.name: Player Controller
prototypes.goal: Basic left-right movement and jump with coyote time optional.

prototypes.name: Level Reset
prototypes.goal: Add hazards and a quick reset on death.

ideas.name: Whack-a-Mole Garden
ideas.short_description: Moles pop up from holes and you click them fast before they hide again.
ideas.core_mechanic: Timed pop-up targets you must click.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Moles appear, you click to score, misses reduce lives, speed increases over time.
ideas.lose_conditions: Run out of lives from too many misses.

prototypes.name: Pop-Up Holes
prototypes.goal: Create a few holes that can show or hide a mole.

prototypes.name: Click to Score
prototypes.goal: Detect clicks on visible moles and add points.

prototypes.name: Speed Ramp
prototypes.goal: Reduce show time over time and add a timer plus lives.

ideas.name: Catapult Target Practice
ideas.short_description: Launch a projectile with angle and power to hit simple targets.
ideas.core_mechanic: Adjust angle and power then fire.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Aim, shoot, observe trajectory, adjust, hit targets in limited shots.
ideas.lose_conditions: Run out of shots.

prototypes.name: Projectile Launch
prototypes.goal: Launch a projectile with physics at a chosen angle and power.

prototypes.name: Targets
prototypes.goal: Add simple targets that get destroyed on hit.

prototypes.name: Shot Counter
prototypes.goal: Track shots and end level on win or fail.

ideas.name: Frogger Cross
ideas.short_description: Cross a road and river with moving hazards to reach safe zones.
ideas.core_mechanic: Grid step movement with moving obstacles.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Step forward, avoid cars, ride logs, reach safe zone, repeat for multiple lanes.
ideas.lose_conditions: Get hit by car, fall into water, or timer runs out.

prototypes.name: Step Movement
prototypes.goal: Move player one tile per input with snap.

prototypes.name: Lane Hazards
prototypes.goal: Spawn cars that move and wrap around the screen.

prototypes.name: Water Logs
prototypes.goal: Add logs that carry player and a timer.

ideas.name: Tiny Space Dock
ideas.short_description: Gently dock a ship by controlling thrust and rotation without crashing.
ideas.core_mechanic: Thrust and rotate with inertia.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Approach slowly, align angle, reduce speed, dock inside the bay, proceed to next dock.
ideas.win_conditions: Dock with speed under a safe threshold.
ideas.lose_conditions: Crash into walls or dock too fast.

prototypes.name: Ship Controls
prototypes.goal: Implement thrust, rotation, and inertia.

prototypes.name: Dock Zone
prototypes.goal: Detect docking when aligned and slow enough.

prototypes.name: Crash Feedback
prototypes.goal: End run on collision and add restart.

ideas.name: Loot Avoider
ideas.short_description: Collect gems while avoiding enemies, but carrying more makes you slower.
ideas.core_mechanic: Speed decreases based on collected loot count.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Grab gems, decide when to bank at a safe zone, risk getting caught while heavy.
ideas.lose_conditions: Get caught while carrying gems, lose all carried gems 3 times.

prototypes.name: Collect Gems
prototypes.goal: Pick up gems and increase a carried count.

prototypes.name: Weight Slowdown
prototypes.goal: Reduce player speed based on carried count.

prototypes.name: Banking
prototypes.goal: Add a safe zone that converts carried into saved gems.

ideas.name: Breakout Remix
ideas.short_description: Classic breakout with a paddle, bouncing ball, and bricks with simple powerups.
ideas.core_mechanic: Reflect a ball with a paddle.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move paddle, keep ball in play, break bricks, grab occasional powerups.
ideas.lose_conditions: Lose 3 balls.

prototypes.name: Paddle + Ball
prototypes.goal: Implement paddle movement and ball bounce.

prototypes.name: Brick Grid
prototypes.goal: Create bricks that break on hit and add score.

prototypes.name: Powerup Drop
prototypes.goal: Randomly drop one powerup that changes paddle size.

ideas.name: Sliding Ice Puzzle
ideas.short_description: Move on ice where you slide until hitting a wall, reach the goal tile.
ideas.core_mechanic: Slide movement that continues until blocked.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Choose direction, slide, stop on obstacles, plan route to reach goal.
ideas.lose_conditions: No lose state, but count moves for score.

prototypes.name: Slide Logic
prototypes.goal: Implement sliding movement that stops at walls.

prototypes.name: Level Tiles
prototypes.goal: Create walls and goal tile using a simple grid map.

prototypes.name: Move Counter
prototypes.goal: Count moves and show a reset button.

ideas.name: Hook Swing Mini
ideas.short_description: Swing from hooks to reach the exit, with simple momentum and detach timing.
ideas.core_mechanic: Grapple to a point, swing, release.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Shoot hook to anchor points, swing, release to gain distance, reach exit.
ideas.lose_conditions: Fall off screen or hit spikes.

prototypes.name: Grapple Attach
prototypes.goal: Attach to a point and draw a rope line.

prototypes.name: Swing Physics
prototypes.goal: Use a joint or constraint to swing with momentum.

prototypes.name: Release Timing
prototypes.goal: Release and keep velocity, add goal and reset.

ideas.name: Tiny Turn-Based Duel
ideas.short_description: A simple turn-based fight: attack, defend, or heal with predictable enemy behavior.
ideas.core_mechanic: Three-choice turn system with simple outcomes.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Pick an action, resolve results, enemy picks action, repeat until someone loses.
ideas.lose_conditions: Player HP reaches zero.

prototypes.name: Turn UI
prototypes.goal: Buttons for attack, defend, heal that apply effects.

prototypes.name: Enemy AI
prototypes.goal: Enemy chooses actions on a simple pattern or random weights.

prototypes.name: Results Screen
prototypes.goal: Add win and lose screens and restart.

ideas.name: Tile Painter
ideas.short_description: Paint all tiles on a grid by moving, like a simple territory fill puzzle.
ideas.core_mechanic: Walking paints tiles, avoid unpainted traps.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move across grid, paint tiles, plan path to cover everything efficiently.
ideas.lose_conditions: Timer ends or you step on a hazard tile.

prototypes.name: Paint on Step
prototypes.goal: Change tile color when player steps on it.

prototypes.name: Completion Check
prototypes.goal: Detect when all tiles are painted.

prototypes.name: Timer or Hazards
prototypes.goal: Add a timer or a few hazard tiles to avoid.

ideas.name: Sentry Scanner
ideas.short_description: Move through rooms, avoid rotating scanners, grab the data chip, escape.
ideas.core_mechanic: Avoid rotating detection beams.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Navigate rooms, time movement between scans, pick up chip, reach exit.
ideas.lose_conditions: Get scanned 3 times.

prototypes.name: Rotating Beam
prototypes.goal: Create a rotating line or cone that detects the player.

prototypes.name: Room Layout
prototypes.goal: Build a simple room with walls and doors.

prototypes.name: Objective Item
prototypes.goal: Add chip pickup and exit unlock.

ideas.name: Bouncy Cannon
ideas.short_description: Shoot a ball that bounces off walls to hit targets, like a simple ricochet puzzle.
ideas.core_mechanic: One shot that bounces multiple times.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Aim, shoot, watch bounces, hit all targets, retry if needed.
ideas.win_conditions: Hit all targets in one shot (or up to 3 shots).
ideas.lose_conditions: Run out of shots.

prototypes.name: Bounce Physics
prototypes.goal: Shoot a ball with high bounciness and predictable speed.

prototypes.name: Targets
prototypes.goal: Add targets that break on hit.

prototypes.name: Shot Limit
prototypes.goal: Limit shots and add restart.

ideas.name: Elevator Escape
ideas.short_description: Ride an elevator upward and dodge hazards on each floor with short choices.
ideas.core_mechanic: Pick left or right at each floor to avoid a hazard.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Elevator stops, hazard preview shows, choose lane, survive floors, score increases.
ideas.lose_conditions: Choose the wrong side and get hit 3 times.

prototypes.name: Floor Events
prototypes.goal: Create a repeating floor stop cycle with a choice timer.

prototypes.name: Hazard Spawns
prototypes.goal: Spawn one hazard pattern per floor and show a warning.

prototypes.name: Hit Counter
prototypes.goal: Track hits and end game on 3.

ideas.name: Tiny Cooking Queue
ideas.short_description: Cook simple orders in order: tap to start cooking, tap to serve before it burns.
ideas.core_mechanic: Orders queue with timers per item.
ideas.gameplay_loop: New orders arrive, start cooking, watch timers, serve at the right time, earn coins.
ideas.win_conditions: Serve 15 orders with at least 12 correct.
ideas.lose_conditions: Too many burned or missed orders.

prototypes.name: Order Queue
prototypes.goal: Spawn simple orders with icons and a countdown timer.

prototypes.name: Cook Timer
prototypes.goal: Start cooking on click and progress to ready and burned.

prototypes.name: Serve Check
prototypes.goal: Serve at ready state for points, penalize burned.

ideas.name: Dodging Dash Arena
ideas.short_description: Survive by dashing through gaps between slow projectiles.
ideas.core_mechanic: Short dash with cooldown and invulnerability window.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Projectiles spawn, you dodge and dash, survive to increase score, difficulty ramps.
ideas.lose_conditions: Get hit 3 times.

prototypes.name: Dash Move
prototypes.goal: Implement dash with cooldown and quick movement burst.

prototypes.name: Projectile Patterns
prototypes.goal: Spawn slow bullets in simple patterns.

prototypes.name: Hit and I-Frames
prototypes.goal: Add hit counter and short invulnerability after hit.

ideas.name: Balloon Rescue
ideas.short_description: Carry a balloon to the goal, but it rises so you must manage weight pickups.
ideas.core_mechanic: Balloon buoyancy plus add and remove weight.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move to weights, attach to control height, avoid spikes, reach goal platform.
ideas.win_conditions: Reach the goal platform and keep balloon intact.
ideas.lose_conditions: Balloon hits spikes or drifts off screen.

prototypes.name: Buoyancy
prototypes.goal: Make balloon rise with a constant upward force.

prototypes.name: Weights
prototypes.goal: Pick up weight items that reduce upward force.

prototypes.name: Hazards
prototypes.goal: Add spikes and goal platform detection.

ideas.name: Tiny Snake Garden
ideas.short_description: A beginner snake game with simple food, walls, and speed increase.
ideas.core_mechanic: Move in grid, grow on food.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move, eat, grow, avoid collisions, aim for a length goal.
ideas.lose_conditions: Hit wall or yourself.

prototypes.name: Grid Movement
prototypes.goal: Move on a grid and prevent reversing direction.

prototypes.name: Food Spawn
prototypes.goal: Spawn food on empty tiles and grow on eat.

prototypes.name: Collision Lose
prototypes.goal: Detect self and wall collision and restart.

ideas.name: Tic Tac Toe Plus
ideas.short_description: Classic tic tac toe with a simple CPU and a quick rematch loop.
ideas.core_mechanic: Place marks on a 3x3 grid and detect 3 in a row.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Player places a mark, CPU places a mark, check win or draw, rematch quickly.
ideas.win_conditions: Get 3 in a row before the CPU.
ideas.lose_conditions: CPU gets 3 in a row first.

prototypes.name: 3x3 Grid UI
prototypes.goal: Clickable cells that place X or O.

prototypes.name: Win Check
prototypes.goal: Detect win lines and draws.

prototypes.name: Simple CPU
prototypes.goal: CPU picks a random empty cell (optionally block obvious wins).

ideas.name: Shadow Platform
ideas.short_description: Platforms only exist when you stand in light, so you move between lamps.
ideas.core_mechanic: Light zones toggle platform solidity.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Move to light source, platforms appear, jump across, reach next light, repeat to exit.
ideas.lose_conditions: Fall into the void.

prototypes.name: Light Zones
prototypes.goal: Create circular zones that the player can enter and exit.

prototypes.name: Platform Toggle
prototypes.goal: Enable platforms when inside light zone.

prototypes.name: Simple Level
prototypes.goal: Build a small level with 3 light zones and an exit.

ideas.name: Tiny Inventory Craft
ideas.short_description: Collect two resources and craft a key to open the exit.
ideas.core_mechanic: Combine items into a crafted output.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Collect wood and metal, craft a key at a bench, open door, escape.
ideas.lose_conditions: Timer runs out (optional) or get hit by a roaming hazard 3 times.

prototypes.name: Collect Resources
prototypes.goal: Pick up resource items and show counts.

prototypes.name: Craft Bench
prototypes.goal: Convert resources into a key when requirements met.

prototypes.name: Locked Door
prototypes.goal: Door opens only if you have the key, then win.

ideas.name: Quick Draw Duel
ideas.short_description: React to a signal, draw and shoot faster than the opponent.
ideas.core_mechanic: Reaction-time input window.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Wait for signal, press shoot quickly, win or lose round, best of 5.
ideas.lose_conditions: Lose 3 rounds.

prototypes.name: Random Signal
prototypes.goal: Signal appears after a random delay.

prototypes.name: Reaction Measure
prototypes.goal: Measure time between signal and input.

prototypes.name: Best of 5
prototypes.goal: Track rounds and show match results screen.

ideas.name: Water Pipe Connect
ideas.short_description: Rotate pipe tiles to connect water from start to finish.
ideas.core_mechanic: Rotate tiles to connect paths.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Rotate tiles, test water flow, adjust until connected, then proceed.
ideas.win_conditions: Connected path from source to sink.
ideas.lose_conditions: No lose state, but move limit optional.

prototypes.name: Pipe Tiles
prototypes.goal: Create tiles with 2 to 4 openings and rotate on click.

prototypes.name: Flow Check
prototypes.goal: Check connectivity from source to sink.

prototypes.name: Level Data
prototypes.goal: Load a small level layout from an array or text map.

ideas.name: Cave Miner Dig
ideas.short_description: Dig down in a grid, collect gems, avoid rocks, and return to the top.
ideas.core_mechanic: Remove tiles to move, limited energy.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Dig tiles, collect gems, manage energy, return to base to win.
ideas.win_conditions: Collect 10 gems and return to start.
ideas.lose_conditions: Energy reaches zero while underground.

prototypes.name: Dig Tiles
prototypes.goal: Click or press to remove a tile in front and move into it.

prototypes.name: Energy
prototypes.goal: Spend energy per dig and show UI.

prototypes.name: Return Objective
prototypes.goal: Win only when gems collected and back at start.

ideas.name: Lane Change Racer
ideas.short_description: A top-down endless racer where you change lanes to avoid traffic.
ideas.core_mechanic: Instant lane switching with cooldown.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Road scrolls, cars spawn, switch lanes to avoid, score increases with distance.
ideas.lose_conditions: Crash into another car.

prototypes.name: Lane Switch
prototypes.goal: Move player between 3 lanes with quick snaps.

prototypes.name: Traffic Spawn
prototypes.goal: Spawn cars in lanes with varying speeds.

prototypes.name: Distance Score
prototypes.goal: Track distance and end on crash.

ideas.name: Puzzle Button Doors
ideas.short_description: Press floor buttons to open doors and reach the exit, with simple timing and order.
ideas.core_mechanic: Buttons change door states.
ideas.gameplay_loop: Explore small room, press buttons to open doors, avoid traps, reach exit.
ideas.win_conditions: Reach exit door while it is open.
ideas.lose_conditions: Touch a trap or get stuck and reset.

prototypes.name: Buttons + Doors
prototypes.goal: Press a button to open a door for a short time.

prototypes.name: Multiple Buttons
prototypes.goal: Add two buttons that control different doors.

prototypes.name: Trap Tiles
prototypes.goal: Add one trap type and a quick reset on hit.
